divs: sighting detailsi have 2 disks of activity of lights (patterns) that cover months of recorded events over a period of about a year or maybe more. this was recorded in carefree, az. the original recordings are on analog tape. i had them transfered to dvd for ease of viewing and shipping. i also had taken still digital pictures of some of the lights as well, before i got my camcorder sent to me. the events took place on a fairly regular basis, when they occured. but then they would hit in spurts. i will be happy to ship the dvd's to you for viewing and analysis, but i need an address. they are very similar to the "phoenix lights" at one point. i tried my best to make note of the date and time on each event. the lights are amber in color, and definitely not airplanes. airplane lights are red, white and green. our (my husband's) former employer, her daughter and son-in-law also saw these, as well. these events took place in 2007-2008. let me know if you are interested in seeing the pictures and\or videos.
trends: There have been 417 other sightings in Phoenix
There were no other sightings in Phoenix on or around August 19th 2008
